project_path.BunnyZillaCoin: contracts/Bunny Zilla Full Smart Contract Security Audit/BunnyZillaCoin

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply()` use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
